live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates. A further update will be provided at 07:05 PT.
60444.summary: Some customers in the Hart Highlands area of Prince George are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
60444.title: Apr 24 - Prince George (Hart Highlands) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
